name: Monster Truck Rally (2011)
description:
Choose your Monster Truck between Total Destroyer,Monster Crusher,T-Rex Butcher,Sasquatch and Black Mamba!

Race on different offroad terrain types on the 5 tracks available.
Desert ,Snowy mountains, Jungle , Country and Canyon environments .
The game sports an amazing physics emulation with 3 game types:
Career,Practice and online multiplayer
Make the others eat your dust! Race with players all over the world with the amazing multiplayer capabilities of this game.

Features:

- Amazing physics emulation

- Online multiplayer .Play with other racers all over the world (even against iPhone,iPad and iPod users)

- 5 amazing Monster Trucks

- 5 long 3d tracks

- 3 game modes . Career ,Practice and Multiplayer
